metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23017 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A security issue in nginx resolver was identified, which might allow an attacker who is able to forge UDP packets from the DNS server to cause 1-byte memory overwrite, resulting in worker process crash or potential other impact.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Luis Merino, Markus Vervier, Eric Sesterhenn

criterions.comment: nginx: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
